about_the_game:
■ Everyone is a suspect!? Up to 12 players can compete online!
Using the communication function of your device, you can compete online with up to 12 players anytime, anywhere, with anyone, and as many times as you want!

■ Ultimate suspense! Night actions determine life or death!!
The murderer's goal is to wipe out the master's family in the mansion. Night after night, the murderer sneaks into rooms, attempting to assassinate the family. They kill indiscriminately, targeting anyone they encounter, even if they're not part of the family...
And once again, the day turns to night. Will you stay in your room? Or will you make a desperate attempt to escape?

■ Innovative! Accusation system!!
Make a judgment on your own and accuse the murderer. If you're correct, you can expel the murderer! However, if you mistakenly accuse someone else, you'll be expelled instead!! There's no room for mistakes! Listen carefully to people's statements and find the murderer!

■ Over 30 unique roles!!
Various roles will disrupt your deductions!

■ Game Description
This game is a chat-based mystery suspense game where players are divided into factions (family faction, murderer faction, and other factions) and compete against each other.

◆ Other notes

・ Prohibited acts
Using usernames that violate public morals, delaying actions during online matches, etc., are prohibited acts as stipulated in the terms of use of this application. Players found to have violated them will face measures such as account suspension.
If you encounter such users, please "block" them.
※ Information about "blocked" players is confirmed by the management team.
"Blocking" can be done at "the end of the match" or from "friends" in the "friends list," "search," or "recently played players."

・ Fraudulent activities
In this application, appropriate sanctions may be taken against users who engage in fraudulent activities such as:

Using cheating programs
Producing or distributing cheating programs
Engaging in fraudulent activities to gain inappropriate profits
Acquiring life points, etc., through fraudulent means
Exploiting in-game bugs
Creating accounts with false information, etc.
Other acts deemed fraudulent by the company

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not suitable for all ages.

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600 Series GPU or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
